CustomField.description: See Help below. The Admin should set (select) this field then revert this field whenever the 1-off event is over.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Admin use. Checkbox is used for exception processing only when there is a need to identify a group of Contacts that do not share any other common characteristic. IE: 1-off email or postal mail to an identified set of Contacts.
CustomField.label: Include This Contact
